data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal! Antwerp have got their heads in front thanks to a Lior Refaelov strike.
In the minute 7, Great play from Martin Hongla to set up the goal.
Goal! Simen Juklerod extends Antwerp's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Lior Refaelov.
In the minute 25, Goal! Musashi Suzuki pulls one back to make it 2-1.
Tarik Tissoudali with an assist there.
Frederic Frans (Beerschot) has received a yellow card from Jasper Vergoote.
In the minute 35, At Bosuilstadion, Martin Hongla has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Pieter Gerkens for Antwerp has been booked by Jasper Vergoote and receives a first yellow card.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a first substitution, with Aurelio Buta replacing Koji Miyoshi.
The home team have replaced Martin Hongla with Birger Verstraete. This is the second substitution made today by Ivan Leko.
In the minute 73, Musashi Suzuki levels the score at 2-2.
Tarik Tissoudali instrumental with a fine assist.
Antwerp take a 3-2 lead thanks to Dieumerci Mbokani.
In the minute 74, Aurelio Buta with an assist there.
Antwerp's Faris Haroun has been booked in Antwerp.
Abdoulie Sanyang is on a sub for Mohamed Halaimia for Beerschot.
In the minute 81, Aurelio Buta is booked for the home team.
Antwerp make their third substitution with Nana Opoku Ampomah replacing Lior Refaelov.
Pierre Bourdin is replacing Yan Vorogovskiy for the away team.
In the minute 86, Abdoulie Sanyang (Beerschot) has received a first yellow card.
That's full-time at Bosuilstadion. The final score is 3-2.
The away team replace Frederic Frans with Mukuna.
